data.text: @Parsifaler Looking for health, fitness, beauty care tips? Considering cosmetic or anti-aging procedures? Find the latest information here. @LisaLam17074438
@OliversWilde @Reeveslives @Parsifaler Nicotine is close in structure to niacin.  Niacin helps defeat Covid.
@intothewhale @Katlia124 @Parsifaler So you're agreeing with me. Ok, that wasn't clear before.

@Nodeling1 @Katlia124 @Parsifaler I think being primed or not depends on the evolutionary path of the virus at this point.

The latest variant currently being tracked in Denmark, and likely everywhere now, indicates a more deadly strain is in circulation.
@readomain @Katlia124 @Parsifaler Staying close to a sick person =\= infection

@Laughterizbest @Katlia124 @Parsifaler For me it was the original in march 2020 also, and possibly a second time in December that year.

A strong dose of Azithromycin helped me shake it off both times.
@Parsifaler If this stuff is so important please break it down so the average person can read it.
